name: CPG
title: Clinical Practice Guidelines
publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

contact.name: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

description: Implementation guidance for creating Clinical Practice Guidelines with formal artifacts to facilitate sharing and implementation of the guideline

resource.name: Activity Example - Administer Medication Library Collection
Activity Example Do Not Collect Information AD
Activity Example Do Not Collect Information PD
Activity Example Do Not Send Message AD
Activity Example Do Not Send Message PD
Activity Example Record Detected Issue AD
Activity Example Record Detected Issue PD
activity-example-administermedication-bundle
resource.description: Example of a bundle for administering a medication

resource.name: CPG Activity Type Code System
resource.description: A type of activity that can be performed as part of the delivery of guideline-based care.

resource.name: CPG Activity Type Value Set
resource.description: A type of activity that can be performed as part of the delivery of guideline-based care

resource.name: CPG Administer Medication Activity
resource.description: Definition of a proposal to administer a medication as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Administer Medication Task
resource.description: Recommendation to administer a specific medication as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Answer Value Set Source Extension
resource.description: The canonical URL for the source value set for the answer options, when those options are provided directly in the questionnaire.

resource.name: CPG Artifact Bundle
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for an artifact bundle used to package and distribute artifact content

resource.name: CPG Assertion Expression Extension
resource.description: Defines formal computational semantics for the feature if it is asserted. This is typically only required if the case feature is of a different type than the profile (e.g. a boolean feature).

resource.name: CPG Asset Collection
resource.description: Profile of the Library resource to describe a collection of related knowledge assets. The collection is a general purpose organizational structure for the purposes of distribution and dependency-management

resource.name: CPG Author Extension
resource.description: Specifies the author of the content.

resource.name: CPG Care Plan
resource.description: CPG care plan represents the care plan for a specific patient. The care plan may be associated with management of a specific condition, and instantiated based on a particular pathway or strategy, or it may be a combined care plan, focused on the patient, and managing treatment for multiple conditions, instantiated based on multiple pathways and strategies

resource.name: CPG Care Team
resource.description: CPG care team represents a care team for a specific patient

resource.name: CPG Care Team Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a definitional care team for use with computable guideline content

resource.name: CPG CarePlan Applly
resource.description: The apply operation applies any conditional logic within a CarePlan to a given context

resource.name: CPG Case
resource.description: CPG case represents a specific case of a patient enrolled in a particular pathway. The enrollment may have been automatic, prompted, or manual.

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Definition
resource.description: Profile of StructureDefinition to represent a case feature of a clinical practice guideline, optionally specifying formal computational semantics, as well as relationships to other case features and specific aspects of the guideline

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Of Extension
resource.description: Defines which guideline elements this case feature definition is a feature of.

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Pertinence Code System
resource.description: The pertinence of a case feature relative to a case, guideline, pathway, strategy, or recommendation.

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Pertinence Extension
resource.description: Describes the pertinence of the case feature.

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Pertinence Value Set
resource.description: A type of activity that can be performed as part of the delivery of guideline-based care

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Type Code System
resource.description: The type of a case feature, whether asserted (i.e. documented in the patient's record) or inferred (i.e. calculated from the case feature expression)

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Type Extension
resource.description: Describes whether the case feature is asserted or inferred.

resource.name: CPG Case Feature Type Value Set
resource.description: A type of activity that can be performed as part of the delivery of guideline-based care

resource.name: CPG Case Plan Progressing Note
resource.description: CPG Case Plan Progressing Note combines relevant case features and feature groups with proposals, plans, and clinical impressions to provide a means to document patient progression with respect to a pathway in the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Case Plan Summary
resource.description: CPG Case Plan Summary addresses information from the plan portion of the CPG, including patient-specific recommendations (i.e., proposals) along with their respective pertinent patient information and guideline recommendations that are either not applicable or not yet applicable to a specific patient

resource.name: CPG Case Plan Summary Definition
resource.description: CPG Case Plan Summary Definition provides a computable definition for the case features and feature groups relevant to a particular pathway, strategy, or recommendation of a clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Case Summary
resource.description: CPG Case Summary is the set of case features and feature groups that completely represent the case data scoped by the clinical practice guideline. This expresses the complete patient state at any given point in time.

resource.name: CPG Case Summary Definition
resource.description: CPG Case Summary Definition provides a computable definition for all the case features and feature groups relevant to a clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Clinical Impression
resource.description: CPG Clinical Impression captures clinician judgement at any particular point, and related to the case features and pathway, strategies, and recommendations.

resource.name: CPG Collect Information Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation to collect information using a specific questionnaire as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Collect With Extension
resource.description: The URL of the questionnaire to be used to collect the information. If this information is not supplied as part of the activity definition, it is expected to be determined dynamically as part of realizing the activity.

resource.name: CPG Common Patient Registry
resource.description: Describes the expected set of functionality required for a patient registry service that supports the common registration process defined in this implementation guide.

resource.name: CPG Common Patient Summary
resource.description: The summary operation generates a patient summary for a patient

resource.name: CPG Common Persona Value Set
resource.description: Common personas used to describe roles and participants in computable content

resource.name: CPG Common Personas Code System
resource.description: Personas are the types of participants in the recommendations of a healthcare guideline, including practitioners, patients, nurses, community health workers, and care partners. The personas identified in this code system are defined based on the WHO recommendation for [Classifying health workers](https://www.who.int/hrh/statistics/Health_workers_classification.pdf). This recommendation uses codes from the [International Standard Classification for Occupations](http://www.ilo.org/public/english/bureau/stat/isco/index.htm) but defines several additional categories of health workers. In addition, the codes in that recommendation are focused on health workers, so codes for patient and care partner personas need to be considered as well. Where a code from the ISCO exists, it is used. Where a WHO recommended health worker category is used, a code is constructed beginning with a W. Where a code is introduced by this implementation guide, it is constructed beginning with a C. Note that the content is incomplete, pending a computable representation of the WHO recommendations.

resource.name: CPG Common Process Code System
resource.description: Common processes performed in providing guideline-based care, regardless of the specific guideline.

resource.name: CPG Common Process Value Set
resource.description: Common processes used to describe the high-level, conceptual activities that occur as part of the delivery of guideline-based care

resource.name: CPG Common Questionnaire - Resolve Patient Match
CPG Communication
resource.description: Documents a communication with a patient or other participant as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Communication Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation for a specific communication with the patient or other participant as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Communication Request
resource.description: Recommendation for a specific communication with the patient or other participant as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Computable Activity Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations and behavior for a computable activity definition for use with content conforming to the CPG implementation guide

resource.name: CPG Computable Graph Definition
resource.description: Profile of GraphDefinition to establish computable expectations for the use of the GraphDefinition resource

resource.name: CPG Computable Guideline
resource.description: Profile of ImplementationGuide to describe a computable Clinical Practice Guideline

resource.name: CPG Computable Library
resource.description: The computable library profile sets the minimum expectations for a computable CQL library

resource.name: CPG Computable Metric
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations and behavior for a computable metric for use with content conforming to the CPG implementation guide

resource.name: CPG Computable Plan Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations and behavior for a computable plan definition

resource.name: CPG Computable Value Set
resource.description: Defines a computable value set as one that SHALL have an expression-based definition (i.e. a value set defined intensionally using expressions of the code systems involved) and MAY have an expansion included. The expression-based definition SHALL be represented in only one of three ways; using the compose element, using the expression extension, or using the rules-text extension to provide a step-by-step process for expanding the value set definition

resource.name: CPG Condition
resource.description: CPG condition represents the minimum expectations for communicating condition/problem information as part of a CPG case

resource.name: CPG Copyright Extension
resource.description: A copyright statement relating to the artifact and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the artifact.

resource.name: CPG CQL
resource.description: Evaluates a CQL expression and returns the results as a Parameters resource.

resource.name: CPG Detected Issue
resource.description: Documents a detected issue within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Direction Of Recommendation Extension
resource.description: Specifies whether the recommendation is "for" or "against" a particular activity. For example, the recommendation to prescribe a particular medication, versus the recommendation not to perform a particular procedure.

resource.name: CPG Dispense Medication Activity
resource.description: Definition of an activity to dispense a specific medication as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Dispense Medication Task
resource.description: Recommendation to dispense a specific medication as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Document Medication Activity
resource.description: Definition of an activity to document a specific medication as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Document Medication Task
resource.description: Recommendation to document the use of a specific medication as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Editor Extension
resource.description: Specified the editor of the content.

resource.name: CPG Enabled Extension
resource.description: Determines whether the artifact on which it appears is Enabled, as opposed to just Known.

resource.name: CPG Encounter
resource.description: CPG encounter represents the minimum expectations for communicating encounter information as part of a CPG case

resource.name: CPG Endorser Extension
resource.description: Specifies the endorser of the content.

resource.name: CPG Enroll In Extension
resource.description: The URL of the PlanDefinition (Strategy or Pathway) in which the patient should be enrolled.

resource.name: CPG Enrolled In Extension
resource.description: Tracks the episode of care for a particular patient enrolled in a particular pathway.

resource.name: CPG Enrollment Activity
resource.description: Definition of an activity to enroll or unenroll a patient in a strategy or pathway as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Enrollment Task
resource.description: Proposal to enroll the patient in a strategy or pathway as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Executable Library
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum expectations for an executable CQL library. Specifically, the profile requires that the library contain one of ELM XML or JSON content, the compiled representation of the CQL logic.

resource.name: CPG Executable Value Set
resource.description: Defines an executable value set as one that SHALL have an expansion included, as well as a usage warning indicating the expansion is a point-in-time snapshot and must be maintained over time for production usage.

resource.name: CPG Feature Expression Extension
resource.description: Defines formal computational semantics for the feature, combining the inference and assertion expressions. This is typically only required if the feature is of a different type than the profile (e.g. a boolean feature).

resource.name: CPG Flag
resource.description: Represents a flag on a patient record within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Generate Report Activity
resource.description: Definition of an activity to generate a metric, measure, or case report as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Generate Report Task
resource.description: Proposal to generate a metric, measure, or case report as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Goal
resource.description: Defines the expectations for the representation of goals used in computable guidelines

resource.name: CPG Goal For Extension
resource.description: The URL of the PlanDefinition (recommendation, strategy, or pathway) that the goal is related to, or defined in support of.

resource.name: CPG Group
resource.description: Defines an actual group of subjects, suitable for use in various contexts, such as a enrollment in a pathway or participant in a study

resource.name: CPG Group Definition
resource.description: Represents the definition of a group of subjects, suitable for use in various contexts, such as a cohort definition, a recommendation inclusion or exclusion criteria, the members of a study, or a population criteria

resource.name: CPG Identifier Extension
resource.description: Provides a business identifier for the artifact.

resource.name: CPG Immunization
resource.description: Documents a particular immunization as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Immunization Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation for a particular immunization as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Immunization Recommendation
resource.description: Recommendation for a particular immunization as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Impression For Extension
resource.description: Specifies a case (episode of care) which this clinical impression is for.

resource.name: CPG Indicator Code System
resource.description: Indicates the urgency/importance of what this recommendation conveys

resource.name: CPG Indicator Value Set
resource.description: Indicates the urgency/importance of what this recommendation conveys

resource.name: CPG Inference Expression Extension
resource.description: Defines formal computational semantics for calculating the case feature if it is not asserted.

resource.name: CPG Instantiates Case Feature Extension
resource.description: References the definition for this case feature.

resource.name: CPG Is Unenrollment Extension
resource.description: Determines whether the activity is to enroll or unenroll the patient in the specified strategy or pathway.

resource.name: CPG Item Image Extension
resource.description: An image to display as a visual accompaniment to the question being asked.

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Capability Code System
resource.description: A capability afforded by a knowledge artifact.

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Capability Extension
resource.description: Defines a knowledge capability afforded by this knowledge artifact.

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Capability Value Set
resource.description: A capability afforded by a knowledge artifact, e.g. shareable, computable, publishable, executable

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Representation Level Code System
resource.description: A knowledge representation level, narrative, semi-structured, structured, and executable

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Representation Level Extension
resource.description: Defines a knowledge representation level provided by this knowledge artifact.

resource.name: CPG Knowledge Representation Level Value Set
resource.description: A knowledge representation level, narrative, semi-structured, structured, and executable

resource.name: CPG Library Evaluate
resource.description: Evaluates the contents of a library and returns the results as a Parameters resource.

resource.name: CPG Location
resource.description: CPG location represents the minimum expectations for communicating location information as part of a CPG case

resource.name: CPG Location Definition
resource.description: CPG location represents the minimum expectations for communicating a definitional location as part of computable guideline content

resource.name: CPG Medicaiton Request
resource.description: Recommendation for a specific medication as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Medication Administration
resource.description: Documents the administration of a particular medication as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Medication Dispense
resource.description: Documents the dispensing of a particular medication as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Medication Request Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation for a specific medication as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Medication Statement
resource.description: Documentation of the use of a particular medication as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Metric Report
resource.description: Records a contextualized metric as calculated within the context of the implementation of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Observation
resource.description: Documents a specific observation as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Order Set Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Order Set for use with CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Organization
resource.description: CPG organization represents the minimum expectations for communicating organization information as part of a CPG case

resource.name: CPG Part Of Extension
resource.description: Specifies the canonical URL of a Pathway or Strategy that this definition is part of.

resource.name: CPG Participant Capability Statement Extension
resource.description: A CapabilityStatement that specifies what capabilities a device must have in order to participant in this action of a PlanDefinition.

resource.name: CPG Pathway Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Clinical Pathway for use with CPG Implementation Guide. A pathway provides groupings of strategies to provide a longitudinal view of the guideline

resource.name: CPG Patient
resource.description: Profile of Patient for use with CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Pertinent Extension
resource.description: The pertinent positive or negative information relevant to the recommendation.

resource.name: CPG Plan For Extension
resource.description: Specifies a case (episode of care) which this care plan is managing.

resource.name: CPG PlanDefinition Apply
resource.description: The apply operation applies a PlanDefinition to a given context

resource.name: CPG Practitioner
resource.description: Profile of Practitioner for use with CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Practitioner Role
resource.description: Profile of PractitionerRole for use with CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Practitioner Role Definition
resource.description: Profile of PractitionerRole to establish definitional practitioner roles with the CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Procedure
resource.description: Documents a procedure as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Propose Diagnosis Activity
resource.description: The definition of a recommendation to propose a specific diagnosis as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Propose Diagnosis Task
resource.description: Recommendation to propose a specific diagnosis as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Publishable Activity Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a publishable activity definition

resource.name: CPG Publishable Case Feature Definition
resource.description: Profile of StructureDefinition to represent the minimum expectations for a publishable case feature of a clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Publishable Code System
resource.description: Defines the expectations for publishable code systems used in computable content

resource.name: CPG Publishable Graph Definition
resource.description: Profile of GraphDefinition to describe the minimum expectations for a publishable Graph Definition

resource.name: CPG Publishable Guideline
resource.description: Profile of ImplementationGuide to describe the minimum expectations for a publishable Clinical Practice Guideline

resource.name: CPG Publishable Library
resource.description: The publishable library defines the must support elements that are important for implementers to use and understand a library

resource.name: CPG Publishable Metric
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a publishable metric for use with computable content

resource.name: CPG Publishable Plan Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition that defines the minimum expectations for a publishable plan definition

resource.name: CPG Publishable Questionnaire
resource.description: Profile of Questionnaire to represent the minimum expectations for a publishable questionnaire used in a clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Publishable Value Set
resource.description: Defines the expectations for publishable value sets used in computable content.

resource.name: CPG Questionnaire Response
resource.description: The response to a particular questionnaire as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Questionnaire Task
resource.description: Recommendation to collect specific information using a particular questionnaire as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Rationale Extension
resource.description: A clinician-friendly explanation for the recommendation; patient-friendly if the recommendation is patient-facing.

resource.name: CPG Recommendation Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Recommendation Definition for use with CPG Implementation Guide

resource.name: CPG Recommendation Direction Code System
resource.description: The direction of a recommendation, either for or against a particular action, taking into account the balance between desirable and undersirable outcomes; the confidence in the magnitude of estimates of effect; the confidence in values and preferences and their variability; and resource use.

resource.name: CPG Recommendation Direction Value Set
resource.description: The direction of a recommendation, either for or against a particular action, taking into account the balance between desirable and undersirable outcomes; the confidence in the magnitude of estimates of effect; the confidence in values and preferences and their variability; and resource use.

resource.name: CPG Record Detected Issue Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation to record a specific detected issue as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Record Detected Issue Task
resource.description: Recommendation to record a specific detected issue as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Record Inference Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation to record a specific inference as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Record Inference Task
resource.description: Recommendation to record a particular inference as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Related Artifact Extension
resource.description: Specifies additional artifacts related to the content.

resource.name: CPG Related Person
resource.description: CPG related person defines the minimum expectations for a person related to a patient in a CPG case, such as a care partner, spouse, or other related person

resource.name: CPG Report Flag Activity
resource.description: Definition of a recommendation to report a particular flag as part of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Report Flag Task
resource.description: Recommendation to report a flag as part of the delivery of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CPG Report With Extension
resource.description: The URL of the artifact that describes the report to be sent, a metric or measure, case report, or profile that describes the data to be reported.

resource.name: CPG Response Image Extension
resource.description: An image to display as a visual accompaniment to the response.

resource.name: CPG Reviewer Extension
resource.description: Specifies the reviewer of the content.

resource.name: CPG Service Request
resource.description: Recommendation for a particular procedure or referral to a specialist or instructions for self-care such as smoking cessation counseling or exercise

resource.name: CPG Service Request Activity
resource.description: The definition of a recommendation for a particular procedure or referral to a specialist or instructions for self-care such as smoking cessation counseling or exercise

resource.name: CPG Shareable Activity Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a shareable activity definition for use with computable guideline content. This profile derives from the ShareableActivityDefinition profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support for declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Code System
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a shareable code systems described for use with computable content. This profile derives from the ShareableCodeSystem profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Graph Definition
resource.description: Profile of GraphDefinition to establish minimum expectations for sharing an GraphDefinition resource, including URL, version, and name. This profile also provides the ability to declare knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Implementation Guide
resource.description: Profile of ImplementationGuide to establish minimum expectations for sharing an ImplementationGuide resource in support of computable content, including URL, version, and name. The profile also provides the ability to declare knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Library
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a shareable library for use with computable content. This profile derives from the ShareableLibrary profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support for declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Metric
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a shareable metric definition described for use with computable content. This profile derives from the ShareableMeasure profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Plan Definition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for a shareable plan definition for use with computable guideline content. This profile derives from the ShareablePlanDefinition profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support for declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Questionnaire
resource.description: Profile of Questionnaire to establish minimum expectations for sharing a Questionnaire, including URL, version, and name. This profile also provides the ability to declare knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities

resource.name: CPG Shareable Structure Definition
resource.description: Profile of StructureDefinition to establish minimum expectations for sharing a StructureDefinition including URL, name, and version. This profile also provides the ability to declare knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Shareable Value Set
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for shareable value sets described in support of computable content. This profile derives from the ShareableValueSet profile defined in the base FHIR specification, and adds support for declaring knowledge representation level and knowledge artifact capabilities.

resource.name: CPG Strategy
resource.description: Profile of RequestGroup as a Strategy for use with the CPG Implementation Guide. Strategies are patient-specific realiziations of strategy definitions and are used to represent aspects of a care plan that still contain optionality among related patient-specific recommendations, typically focused on a particular condition or state within the overall guideline or pathway

resource.name: CPG Strategy Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Strategy Definition for use with CPG Implementation Guide. Strategies are used to group recommendations together, typically focused on a particular condition or state within the overall guideline or pathway

resource.name: CPG Summary Definition For Extension
resource.description: Specifies which clinical practice guideline, pathway, strategy, or recommendation this is a summary definition for.

resource.name: CPG Summary For Extension
resource.description: Specifies a case (episode of care), pathway, strategy, or recommendation which this summary is for.

resource.name: CPG Task
resource.description: Defines the expectations common to tasks that represent activities used in computable guidelines

resource.name: CPG Test Case Bundle
resource.description: The CPG Test Case Bundle Profile describes a shareable, published test case for a specific artifact

resource.name: CPG Title Extension
resource.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly name for the artifact.

resource.name: CPG Topic Extension
resource.description: Descriptive topics related to the content of the artifact. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the artifact that can be useful for filtering and searching.

resource.name: CPG Usage Warning Extension
resource.description: An extra warning about the correct use of the value set.

resource.name: CPG Workflow Definition
resource.description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Workflow Definition for use with CPG Implementation Guide

page.title: Separating and Defining Case, Plan, and Workflow
6S Evidence Pyramid and Learning Health Systems
Analysis of Evidence, Recommendations, and Reporting
Development of Computable Clinical Guideline Artifacts
